sentences.english: It's a great pleasure to send you our sincere congratulations on your new appointment.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興爲您的新職表達至誠的祝賀。

sentences.english: Completely lost in a make-believe world, I seemed to see all the lamplights drifting from the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一念至誠的將假作真，燈光似乎都從地上飄起。

sentences.english: Her fervent prayers touched the heart of Buddha and so he appeared to grant her wish.
sentences.chinese: 她的至誠，感動了佛心，於是現身遂其所願。

sentences.english: "Pursuit of excellence, Dedication to really good" is my social service purposes.
sentences.chinese: “追求盡善盡美，奉獻至真至誠”是我社的服務宗旨。

sentences.english: Please accept our sincere thanks for your kindness.
sentences.chinese: 你的愛心，請接受我至誠的謝意。

sentences.english: He's just a thoroughly good fella, it's as simple as that.
sentences.chinese: 他是個至真至誠的好哥們兒，就這麼簡單。

sentences.english: Underneath his cool appearance, here exists a hot Listent.
sentences.chinese: 在他冷酷的外表下有一顆至誠的心。

sentences.english: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.
sentences.chinese: 你所命定的法度，是憑公義和至誠。

sentences.english: Underneath his cold appearance, there exists a warm heart.
sentences.chinese: 在他冷酷的外表下有一顆至誠的心。
請求您接受我們至誠的祈願。

sentences.english: Accept my sincere congratulations to you and dear John upon the arrival of a son.
sentences.chinese: 我至誠地祝賀你與約翰生了個兒子。

definition: to return to the right path/to mend one's ways/to reform/Reformed (church etc)
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
to pass on the light of Buddha
of all virtues filial piety is most important (idiom)
displaying fully/developing to the greatest extent
